author_id.description: The unique identifier of the author of the comment.

body.description: The content or text of the comment.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was created.

html_url.description: The URL link to the HTML representation of the comment.

id.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

locale.description: The locale or language of the comment.

non_author_editor_id.description: The unique identifier of a non-author who edited the comment.

non_author_updated_at.description: The timestamp when the non-author last updated the comment.

source_id.description: The ID of the source associated with the comment.

source_type.description: The type of the source associated with the comment.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was last updated.

url.description: The URL link to the comment resource.

vote_count.description: The total count of votes received on the comment.

vote_sum.description: The sum of votes received on the comment, considering upvotes and downvotes.
